WorkItem.Description:
When clicking on the first few pixels of the rate it box, the items is being rated 0. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Hi, I've been using rateit for a few days now,thanks! I just noticed there are a bunch of 0 values being submitted to my database. I want the possible values should be only 1,2,3,4,5 and I want users to be able to update their rating but not delete, so this is why I am using data-rateit-resetable="false" which from the documentation seems to not display reset button: > HTML: data-rateit-resetable, JS: resetable = when not readonly, whether to show the reset button (default: true) This is my HTML: >
This is my javascript: > $('#rating_wrapper .rateit').bind('rated reset', function (e) { What am I doing wrong? Is it including reset in my Javascript? How are users submitting a rating of 0, I'm not able to duplicate this? Thanks!
